# API Reference for cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps

   ArtifactoryBackendProps <a name="ArtifactoryBackendProps" id="cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps"></a>
  
  Stores the state as an artifact in a given repository in Artifactory.
  
  Generic HTTP repositories are supported, and state from different configurations
  may be kept at different subpaths within the repository.
  
  Note: The URL must include the path to the Artifactory installation.
  It will likely end in /artifactory.
  
  This backend does not support state locking.
  
  Read more about this backend in the Terraform docs:
  https://www.terraform.io/language/settings/backends/artifactory
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```python
  import cdktf
  
  cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps(
    password: str,
    repo: str,
    subpath: str,
    url: str,
    username: str
  )
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.password">password</a></code> | <code>str</code> | (Required) - The password. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.repo">repo</a></code> | <code>str</code> | (Required) - The repository name. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.subpath">subpath</a></code> | <code>str</code> | (Required) - Path within the repository. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.url">url</a></code> | <code>str</code> | (Required) - The URL. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.username">username</a></code> | <code>str</code> | (Required) - The username. |
